message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $8500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a new offer of $9000. This is the best I can do, considering the value I place on the product.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me see if I can come up with a better proposal. How about $8750?

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $8900. This is the lowest I can go without losing too much profit.
